tool_description: Detection of all possible languages with probability scores.
name: Language Detection_v2
title: Language Detection

api_list.name: Language Codes List
api_list.description: Return list of language codes in ISO 639-1 format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://language-detection5.p.rapidapi.com/get_language_codes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "language-detection5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://language-detection5.p.rapidapi.com/get_language_codes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "language-detection5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
